TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PcaTransform extends Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.OneToOneTransformBase
Public NotInheritable Class PcaTransform Inherits OneToOneTransformBase

Docs.summary: PCA is a dimensionality-reduction transform which computes the projection of the feature vector to onto a low-rank subspace.
Docs.remarks: Principle Component Analysis (PCA) is a dimensionality-reduction transform which computes the projection of the feature vector to onto a low-rank subspace. Its training is done using the technique described in the paper: Combining Structured and Unstructured Randomness in Large Scale PCA, and the paper Finding Structure with Randomness: Probabilistic Algorithms for Constructing Approximate Matrix DecompositionsRandomized Methods for Computing the Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) of very large matricesA randomized algorithm for principal component analysisFinding Structure with Randomness: Probabilistic Algorithms for Constructing Approximate Matrix Decompositions
